articles.description: Sonos Sub Mini: what to expect from the budget subwoofer to partner the Ray
articles.content: Last week, Sonos officially unveiled the Sonos Ray, its most affordable soundbar to date. And if you were waiting (longing and yearning) for a new budget subwoofer to go with it, you're not alone. So… [+2706 chars]
